llm_res.rule: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
transfer function should return true on success.
Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
allowance function should return the remaining number of tokens that the spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.
